profile.brief: Product Manager and Software/Web Development Manager

biography.text: A strong self-starter with a passion for all things technical. I am a sociable and open-minded individual inspired by problem solving and developing creative solutions. Always looking to get other people on board with ideas and getting people excited about things in the same way I do. I am a keen traveller, cyclist and a season ticket holder with a local football club. I also have a strong interest in comedy, particularly satire, improv & stand-up.

items.name: SPT
items.description: At present I run a team of 5, consisting of software engineers and business analysts. I am responsible for the delivery of our Digital Transformation plan in line with our current Digital Strategy. We deliver technical products to a wide variety of stakeholders in order to aid the provision of transport across the Strathclyde region. Using an API-centric design I’ve lead the team in delivering a hugely scalable architecture from which to integrate every aspect of our business, into one source of data powering several different systems. We are 2 years into 3-year legacy application replacement programme that allows us to exercise our use of the agile scrum framework, replacing 24 years worth of product in just 3 years.
